title: Nexus
subtitle: CalHacks 10.0 Hackathon

title: AI Gesture Art
subtitle: OpenCV Hackathon
description: An Android app utilizing OpenCV and generative AI to create works of art from hand gestures.

title: Github Rewards Program

description: A Github rewards program that incentivizes developers to contribute to open source projects.

title: Sound Conductor

title: iSpyAI
subtitle: OSU Hackathon

title: Are You Smarter Than AI?
subtitle: AWS Amplify Hackathon
description: A multiplayer Turing test game where you try to guess if the other player is a human or an AI.
